name: ReplacingNotepads
0:
”Alexa, open replacing notepads”
”Alexa, start replacing notepads”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: replacing notepads
des:
Listen to this story about the wheel of time. As technology progresses, will we replace paper completely with e-paper? Is the Boogie Board e-paper, will we have friendly boogies everywhere, will we restore trust, as we use more and more documents, guard dogs and surveillance cameras? Listen on to see the wheel of time turn, while we adopt more and more e-paper in our lives.
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
